Question: To play (an instrument); to make ring
To make a lot of noise
To Trust X; have faith in X
To finish (e.g. ‘the teacher is finishing class’)
To start, to begin (e.g. the teacher is starting class)
To start, to begin (e.g. Class is starting)
To lower, to lessen, to decrease
بجانا (bajana)
Answer: To play (an instrument); to make ring

Question: شور مچانا (shore machana)
Answer: To make a lot of noise

Question: بھروسہ کرنا (bharosa karna)
Answer: To Trust X; have faith in X

Question: ختم کرنا (khatam karna)
Answer: To finish (e.g. ‘the teacher is finishing class’)

Question: شروع کرنا (shuru karna)
Answer: To start, to begin (e.g. the teacher is starting class)

Question: شروع ہونا (shuru hona)
Answer: To start, to begin (e.g. Class is starting)

Question: کم کرنا (kam karna)
Answer: To lower, to lessen, to decrease
